Step 1 - Establish Strong Company Management Systems

Status: active Topic: governance.compliance Version: 1

Description

Companies must adopt and publish a supply chain policy, structure internal management to support due diligence, establish controls and transparency systems, strengthen supplier engagement, and establish grievance mechanisms.

Sub-criteria

  • Step 1A - Adopt and Commit to Supply Chain Policy (v1)
  • Step 1B - Structure Internal Management (v1)
  • Step 1C - Establish System of Controls and Transparency (v1)
  • Step 1D - Strengthen Company Engagement with Suppliers (v1)
  • Step 1E - Establish Company-Level Grievance Mechanism (v1)
